description: Intents that MUST be blocked. These match hostile patterns in HITH.

intents.text: The system should work perfectly and handle everything.
intents.hostileReason: "Everything" and "perfectly" are undefined. No trigger, state, or outcome can be derived.

intents.text: Users should have a good experience when using the app.
intents.hostileReason: "Good experience" is subjective and unmeasurable. No concrete behavior specified.

intents.text: When user saves, data syncs to the cloud and notifications are sent to all relevant parties.
intents.hostileReason: Claims external outcomes (cloud, notifications) that cannot be verified without ERA. No API defined.

intents.text: The application integrates with all third-party services required for the business.
intents.hostileReason: "All third-party integrations" is undefined. No specific APIs, no verification possible.

intents.text: Display user profile (with ability to manage all account settings and preferences).
intents.hostileReason: Parenthetical claims form exists but "manage" requires state mutation and persistence - not just display.

intents.text: Users can log in to access their personalized dashboard.
intents.hostileReason: Existence of login page does not prove authentication works. No state, no session, no validation.

intents.text: The API handles all CRUD operations for every entity in the system.
intents.hostileReason: "All" and "every entity" without enumeration. Impossible to verify completeness.

intents.text: Form validation covers all edge cases.
intents.hostileReason: "All edge cases" is infinite. No finite verification possible.

intents.text: The calculator correctly computes results for every possible input.
intents.hostileReason: "Every possible input" is infinite. "Correctly" is undefined without specification.

intents.text: Dashboard automatically refreshes with latest data.
intents.hostileReason: Claims temporal behavior but no interval/timer mechanism specified. No state for tracking refresh.

intents.text: Inactive sessions timeout after appropriate period.
intents.hostileReason: Claims timeout behavior with no timer, no activity tracking, no session state defined.

intents.text: Stock prices update in real-time as market changes.
intents.hostileReason: "Real-time" is undefined. No WebSocket, SSE, or push mechanism specified. No external verification.

intents.text: The AI understands user intent and fulfills all requests optimally.
intents.hostileReason: Multiple undefined terms: "understands", "fulfills", "all", "optimally". Complete semantic void.

intents.text: Premium users get faster performance and exclusive features.
intents.hostileReason: "Faster" is relative. "Exclusive features" undefined. No constraint on what makes premium different.

intents.text: The application is secure and compliant with all regulations.
intents.hostileReason: "Secure" and "all regulations" are unbounded. No specific security measures or regulations named.
